name: Breakfast
description: E.g. Barley bread dipped in wine; teganites (pancake)

name: Lunch
description: Bread and wine; light foods like figs, salted fish, cheeses, olives, and bread

name: Dinner
description: E.g. eggs from quail and hens, fish, legumes, olives, cheeses, bread, figs, vegetables including arugula, asparagus, cabbage, carrots, and cucumbers; meats

name: Beverages (Main drink)
description: Wine and Water; Thasos, Lesbos, and Chios wines; kykeon (combination of barley gruel, water (or wine), herbs, and goat cheese)

name: Dessert
description: Cheeses, figs, or olives drizzled with honey

name: Fruit
description: E.g. olives, carob, jujubes (red dates), bergamot oranges (citrus fruit), grapes, raisins, pomegranates, plums, apples, nuts, pears, quinces
